name: Brick Hill: Animated Rainbow Theme
description:
'Brick Hill: Animated Rainbow Theme' is a personalizable RGB colour setup for https://brick-hill.com, on the website some elements(buttons, pages, etc.) will change to rainbow-like colours, it's great for those who own a RGB computer setup.

• Built-in Dark Mode + Customizations for it.
• Repairs some on-site related bugs(element positions, sizes etc.)

⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃ ⁃

Created by:
https://www.brick-hill.com/user/6765/
https://www.twitter.com/Kaiokenoh/





————————————
